name: Chinese Expeditionary Force - Assault Team
description:
Chinese Expeditionary Force - Assault Team is a tactical stealth game set in the expedition of the Chinese Expeditionary Force to Burma during the Second World War. After the disastrous defeat of the first expedition, the Chinese Expeditionary Force decided to counterattack Burma. Several advance assault teams were tasked with pre-prospecting, reconnaissance and sabotage missions. You need to take control of one of the assault teams and complete the mission in your way in order to assist the main force to take the victory.

The assault team you control consists of five characters, each with their own special skills.
  • Killer: Good at assassination with flying knife. He can also make noise to distract enemies and can climb and jump on special terrain.
  • Hunter: Use trap to assassinate enemies, or simply use grenades to eliminate multiple enemies at once.
  • Gunner: Equipped with a powerful submachine gun. He can hide in the shadows and whistle to attract the enemy to come and eliminate them.
  • Sniper: Uses a sniper rifle to eliminate enemies from a distance. He can also throw a decoy to attract enemies to pick it up.
  • Spy: Equipped with a silenced pistol perfect for assassination. He can also disguise himself as an enemy officer to attract and change the enemy's vision.

Your battlefields include mountains, fortresses, airports, and towns, and you'll need to use everyone's skills wisely according to the environment and mission objectives.

You can choose different strategies to complete the mission: assassination, non-lethal damage, avoiding conflict, or choosing a firefight if it is unavoidable.

A reasonable and effective choice of battle mode is also crucial to completing the mission.
  • Team mode: You can plan each character's attack action in advance, and then give a command to strike at the same time.
  • Defensive Mode: Allows the characters to automatically attack any enemy that comes within range.
